sections: As the fourth most powerful car Ferrari has ever made, the F12berlinetta has won multiple awards and accolades from enthusiasts and the press. Now, a well-equipped N-Largo Edition can be yours for less than $600k.
A rightful successor to the legendary 599,

represented the next step up for the Italian automakerâ€™s forward mid-engined design. A sprint to 62-mph could be accomplished in exactly 3.1-seconds and the car was capable of beating its predecessor around the Fiorano test circuit by a full second. Styling was improved as well with sharpened body lines and a sportier overall look that helped to increase downforce. On top of having an already long list of improvements,

was also well-equipped with all that Ferrari had to offer the model at the time and when NOVITEC, the leading refinement specialist for Ferraris gets a hold of one, the results are almost unbelievable. Power is bumped to 781-horsepower and a wide body boosts aerodynamic efficiency.
Ferrari of San Diego is offering

. Finished in the iconic Rossa Corsa shade of red over a Nero interior. Among the expected options list is of course a  4-wheel disc brakes system with ABS, stability control, air-bags, and power everything. However, the additional equipment list is a lot longer. An active suspension system paired with alloy wheels enhance already track-worthy capabilities while a locking limited-slip differential and traction control make it easy to drive. Inside is a leather upholstered interior that features such options as an auto-dimming rearview mirror, automatic headlights, BlueTooth connectivity, climate control, cruise control, and navigation.
For more on this 2015 Ferrari F12berlinetta and how to make it yours click
